gen:link.msg:message: {fmt:common(($e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n))} sum({fmt:fact($e, ($e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n))}) + sum({fmt:fact($f, ($e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n))}) = (sum({fmt:fact($g, ($e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n))}) - sum({fmt:fact($h, ($e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n))}) - sum({fmt:fact($i, ($e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n))}) - sum({fmt:fact($j, ($e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n))})) - (sum({fmt:fact($k, ($e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n))}) - sum({fmt:fact($l, ($e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n))}) - sum({fmt:fact($m, ($e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n))}) - sum({fmt:fact($n, ($e, $f, $g, $h, $i, $j, $k, $l, $m, $n))})) {fmt:threshold(iaf:error-margin(iaf:sum((iaf:sum($e), iaf:sum($f)))) + iaf:error-margin(iaf:sum(((iaf:sum((iaf:sum($g), iaf:numeric-unary-minus(iaf:sum($h)), iaf:numeric-unary-minus(iaf:sum($i)), iaf:numeric-unary-minus(iaf:sum($j))))), iaf:numeric-unary-minus((iaf:sum((iaf:sum($k), iaf:numeric-unary-minus(iaf:sum($l)), iaf:numeric-unary-minus(iaf:sum($m)), iaf:numeric-unary-minus(iaf:sum($n))))))))))} {fmt:difference(abs((sum($e) + sum($f)) - ((sum($g) - sum($h) - sum($i) - sum($j)) - (sum($k) - sum($l) - sum($m) - sum($n)))))}
